title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1905.1 - Technical assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1905.1 - Technical assistance

State Regulations
(a) Subject
to the availability of funds, the corporation shall provide technical services
or assistance or contract to provide for technical services or assistance to
eligible applicants, recipients, subrecipients, or local program
administrators. (b) Local program
administrators may provide engineering and architectural services related to a
project to subrecipients. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1905.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
